A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Parts of the story seemed rushed\, parts ignored\,  and parts unrealistic\, but it is a sci-fi movie and not a study in the scientific journal.  Enjoy the movie for what it is.  Certainly no Rogue 1 or Empire\, but it is not the disaster that Phantom was either.\n\nSolid film that could have used more time on some story lines and less on others.
